radiographic_examinations.findings: Bibasilar atelectasis. Peripherally hyperenhancing 1.2 x 1.5 cm lesion in segment 6 of the liver with surrounding likely perfusion heterogeneity. No evidence of intrahepatic or extrahepatic biliary dilatation. Gallbladder within normal limits. Normal pancreas, spleen, adrenal glands, kidneys, stomach, small bowel, colon, and rectum. Dilated and fluid-filled appendix measuring up to 1 cm with calcified fecaliths and periappendiceal stranding. No free fluid or free air.
